pr_title: Android - removed wcp apis from calling refresh token api

timeline.message: removed wcp apis from calling refresh token

timeline.bodyText: does this include study-datastore calls as well?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: yes, for mobile apps wcp means study-datastore apis
replies.author: naveenr-btc

replies.bodyText: mobile app needs to ignore refresh token calls for study-datastore apis because they don't have access token associated to them.
replies.author: naveenr-btc
